label: ham
subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! AP: Fourth Suspect In JFK Terror Plot Surrenders
body: Hard-won, self-acquired, self-earned property! Do you mean the property of the petty artisan and of the small peasant, a form of property that preceded the bourgeois form? There is no need to abolish that; the development of industry has to a great extent already destroyed it, and is still destroying it daily.
